| History                 = Department K is a covert special branch of the [[Canada|Canadian]] government.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 2}}

They were responsible for reviving the original [[Weapon X (Earth-616)|Weapon X Program]],{{r|Deadpool and Death Annual Vol 1 1998}} experimenting on various operatives such as [[Garrison Kane (Earth-616)|Garrison Kane]] and [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Wade Wilson]]. Years later, Kane became the new [[Weapon X]] and K's top operative.{{r|X-Force Vol 1 2}}{{r|Deadpool: The Circle Chase Vol 1 3}}

Former Weapon X Program subject [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Logan]] briefly joined Department K, working with [[Central Intelligence Agency (Earth-616)|C.I.A.]] agents [[Richard Parker (Earth-616)|Richard]] and [[Mary Parker (Earth-616)|Mary Parker]].{{r|Untold Tales of Spider-Man Vol 1 -1}} He fought against [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]] and the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]], until he was fired after a case of homicide.{{r|Logan: Shadow Society Vol 1 1}}

Department K also organized a complete strike team known as [[Weapon P.R.I.M.E. (Earth-616)|Weapon P.R.I.M.E.]].{{r|X-Force Vol 1 11}}

They were also apparently responsible for the behavioral reconditioning that changed [[Kyle Gibney (Earth-616)|Wild Child]] into Weapon Omega for a time.{{r|Alpha Flight Vol 1 115|117}}
